General.Name: TrackX Holdings Inc
General.Description: TrackX Holdings Inc., an enterprise asset management company, deploys Software-as-a-Solutions for use in the tracking and management of physical assets primarily in the United States. Its solutions include TrackX GAME (Global Asset Management for Enterprises), an industrial Internet of Things (IoT) platform that provides item level tracking, workflow processing, event management, alerting, and analytics to deliver solutions across various industries. The company's GAME solution is used in the recreational vehicle and IT asset tracking; supply chain velocity; IoT device; data capture and predictive analytic; and returnable transportation item and reusable asset management. It serves customers in industries, such as beverage, brewery, transportation, automotive, hi-tech, hospitality, mining, agriculture, horticulture, and manufacturing, as well as government. TrackX Holdings Inc. is headquartered in Denver, Colorado.
General.Address: 7800 East Union Avenue, Denver, CO, United States, 80237
